mapper.update: update kj_jbzxapiuser set api_money=#{api_money}, api_uptime=#{api_uptime} where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into kj_jbzxapiuser ( id, appkey, api_name, api_tel, api_card, api_companyname, api_companyaddress, api_uptime, api_addtime, api_money, api_type )values( #{id}, #{appkey}, #{api_name}, #{api_tel}, #{api_card}, #{api_companyname}, #{api_companyaddress}, #{api_uptime}, #{api_addtime}, #{api_money}, #{api_type} )
